mapper.select: select id,userId,tenderee,tender_company,project_name,agreement_price,project_location,schedule,end_date,start_time,contact_name,contact_mobile,tender_address,tender_money,contract_status,bill_status,price_status,explainl,tender_file,bid_file,status,update_time,project_type,classification from tender where project_name = #{projectName}

select id,userId,tenderee,tender_company,project_name,agreement_price,project_location,schedule,end_date,start_time,contact_name,contact_mobile,tender_address,tender_money,contract_status,bill_status,price_status,explainl,tender_file,bid_file,status,update_time,project_type,classification from tender where userId = #{userId}

select id,userId,tenderee,tender_company,project_name,agreement_price,project_location,schedule,end_date,start_time,contact_name,contact_mobile,tender_address,tender_money,contract_status,bill_status,price_status,explainl,tender_file,bid_file,status,update_time,project_type,classification from tender order by id desc

select id,userId,tenderee,tender_company,project_name,agreement_price,project_location,schedule,end_date,start_time,contact_name,contact_mobile,tender_address,tender_money,contract_status,bill_status,price_status,explainl,tender_file,bid_file,status,update_time,project_type,classification from tender order by id desc limit 13
select id,userId,project_name,start_time,classification from tender where classification = #{classification} order by id desc
select id,userId,project_name,start_time,classification from tender where classification <= 5 order by id desc

select id,userId,tenderee,tender_company,project_name,agreement_price,project_location,schedule,end_date,start_time,contact_name,contact_mobile,tender_address,tender_money,contract_status,bill_status,price_status,explainl,tender_file,bid_file,status,update_time,project_type,classification from tender where classification > 5 and classification <= 12 order by id desc

select id,userId,tenderee,tender_company,project_name,agreement_price,project_location,schedule,end_date,start_time,contact_name,contact_mobile,tender_address,tender_money,contract_status,bill_status,price_status,explainl,tender_file,bid_file,status,update_time,project_type,classification from tender where classification > 12 and classification <= 17 order by id desc

select id,userId,tenderee,tender_company,project_name,agreement_price,project_location,schedule,end_date,start_time,contact_name,contact_mobile,tender_address,tender_money,contract_status,bill_status,price_status,explainl,tender_file,bid_file,status,update_time,project_type,classification from tender where classification > 17 and classification <= 20 order by id desc

select id,userId,tenderee,tender_company,project_name,agreement_price,project_location,schedule,end_date,start_time,contact_name,contact_mobile,tender_address,tender_money,contract_status,bill_status,price_status,explainl,tender_file,bid_file,status,update_time,project_type,classification from tender where classification = 21 order by id desc
select count(*) from tender where classification <= 5
select count(*) from tender where classification > 5 and classification <= 12
select count(*) from tender where classification > 12 and classification <= 17
select count(*) from tender where classification > 17 and classification <= 20
select count(*) from tender where classification = 21

select count(*) from tender where
userId = #{userId}
